name: Christian D'Albano
title: Full-Stack Engineer
summary: Dynamic Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in developing efficient and accessible Web applications using modern frameworks such as Vue.js, React, Web Builders such as Shopify & Wordpress. Proven success in reducing client inquiries by 40% and improving API integration reliability by 35% in the education and healthcare sectors. Proficient in integrating different Saas solutions, AI functionalities through APIs and enhancing web solutions with intelligent interactivity. Skilled in analyzing user behavior and traffic statistics to align digital strategies with client needs and market trends and high level documentation on technical knowledge. Seeking to leverage my skills to drive innovative web solutions in a fast-paced tech environment.

technical_proficiency.backend_development: Node.js, Django, Flask, RESTful APIs, GraphQL
technical_proficiency.devops_cloud: Microsoft Azure, AWS (EC2, S3, RDS), Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, CI/CD pipelines
technical_proficiency.tools_platforms: Git, GitHub, ServiceNow, Figma, Adobe XD, Jira, Wordpress, Shopify, Photoshop, Optimizely, Convert

responsibilities: Developed and maintained Front-end, web integrations & core applications using Vue, Rest API, JavaScript, HTML and CSS
Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure optimal user experience across various devices and screen sizes.
Authored comprehensive technical documentation and knowledge base entries to support user onboarding and reduce support inquiries by 40%.

responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and enhance the patient portal web application using JavaScript and Dart.
Contributed to the successful migration of the patient portal to Flutter, ensuring seamless functionality and improved user experience.
Troubleshot and resolved application bugs and performance issues, improving overall application stability and reliability.
Managed the full development lifecycle for web application features, from requirements gathering to deployment.
Provided detailed feedback and code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
